entry.title: Python 学习
entry.content:
这段时间有时候会利用空余时间学习Python

使用的版本是2.7

使用requests获取网络资源
GET

import requests

params = "key1="+value1+"&key2="+value2+"&keyn"+valuen

html = requests.get("http://www.baidu.com",params)

print html.text

POST

import requests

params ={"key1":"value1","key2":"value2","keyn":"valuen"}

html = requests.get("http://www.baidu.com",params)

print html.text
